title: Panel
desc:
Post 5166
*I lift up the panel*
Abilities:
- Get a visitor to lift you (3 Charges)
Attributes:
- If an evil player visits you while you are waiting to be lifted, they must say "I Lift up the panel" every 5 minutes in their player channel during the day, or else be roleblocked and blackmailed the following day. Oh yeah, their visit also fails. If they have a factional chat, they cannot speak there.
- If a good player visits you, nothing will happen.
Goal: Find and hang every criminal and evildoer
